clauses.title: Data Processing
clauses.summary: Google processes customer data only for the purposes outlined in the agreement.

clauses.title: Data Security
clauses.summary: All data must be encrypted in transit and at rest, with access controls in place.

clauses.title: Subprocessor Use
clauses.summary: Google may use subprocessors with prior notification and written agreement.

insights.message: Renewal needed soon to remain compliant with GDPR obligations.
Subprocessor approvals may delay processing if not managed properly.

evidence.snippet: Data processing limited to specified purposes; unauthorized use prohibited.
Subprocessors will be used only with prior notice and written consent.
